items.text: fuller outside off, clears his front leg, and smashes, but straight to long-off
slower one, length outside off, dabbed towards third man
slower one, looks to go aerial and smash it on the leg side, fails to make a connection
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: back of length, on the stumps, pushed towards mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps and lofted straight over the bowler's head, clears the long-off boundary with ease
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, SIX runs

items.text: drags the length this time, whipped away towards midwicket for two more
length, down the leg side, flicked towards the right of fine leg for another couple of runs
fuller on the stumps, slower one, deflected towards fine leg
short outside off, backs away and smashes it past point for four, a big over for West Indies, 15 coming from that
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller outside off, pushes it towards point and sets off for a single, makes it easily

items.preText: MR Hriju: "Last 5 overs 37/0 at a rate of 7.40 per over without losing any wicket. That's a sign that still this pitch can be good batting track. You just have to understand the bowl. "
items.text: length ball, backs away and looks to pull it over square leg, gets a top-edge towards backward point where Mehidy settles under it

dismissal.text: RL Chase c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Mustafizur Rahman 32 (38b 1x4 1x6) SR: 84.21

items.preText:
Kemar Roach comes in

Sahadath: ""Any thing over 200 may be tricky to chase down"..what do u think Mr. Hemant?" -- Don't think they can reach 200
items.text: short of length, goes back and pulls it towards deep backward point
length outside off, a cutter for Fizz, beats the bat as Roach looks to run it down
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Roach, no run

items.text: almost an action replay of the last ball, another cutter, Roach was looking for a single to third man, gets beaten again
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Roach, no run

items.text: a touch fuller and on the stumps, pushed towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Roach, no run

items.text: fuller on the off, Paul clears his front leg and launches it over deep midwicket, great sound off the bat as it sails over the boundary
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, SIX runs

items.text: drags his length short, on middle and leg, Paul backs away and chips it towards long-off
slower one, angled towards middle and leg, doesn't rise at all after pitching, just misses the leg stump as Roach looks to heave it on the leg side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Roach, no run

items.text: on the pads and picked away towards midwicket, two more to the total
slower one on the pads, picked up towards deep backward square leg, Shakib goes for the catch but it lands just short, he does well to take it on the bounce
length ball and pulled away this time, towards the left Shakib this time, one bounce four
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, clears his front leg and looks to go big, over midwicket, gets an outside edge just over Mashrafe at extra cover
cutter, leaving the batsman who was looking to go over wide long-on, ends up slicing it towards backward point, where Mehidy takes a tumbling catch running backwards

dismissal.text: KMA Paul c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Mustafizur Rahman 36 (28b 1x4 2x6) SR: 128.57

items.text: short of length, backs away and looks to heave it on the leg side, an inside edge to short fine leg
slower one outside off, hits straight back towards the bowler, an easy catch for Fizz towards his right

dismissal.text: D Bishoo c & b Mustafizur Rahman 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00
